name: Monthly Well-Child Check-Up
content: Regular monthly well-child check-up to monitor growth and development.

name: Hepatitis A Immunization
content: Administer pending Hepatitis A vaccine.

name: Introducing Mixed Vegetables
content: Introduce and encourage a variety of mixed vegetables into Robin's diet to ensure balanced nutrition.

name: Developmental Milestones Assessment
content: Assess and monitor any slight developmental delays to ensure Robin is on track.

name: Weekly Physical Activity
content: Ensure Robin engages in physical activities at least once a week.

name: Safety Check of Childcare Environment
content: Evaluate and ensure the safety of Robin’s environment while under nanny care.

name: Sleep Routine Establishment
content: Establish a consistent sleep routine to support healthy sleep habits.

name: Parental Nutrition Education
content: Provide educational resources for Rachel on balanced nutrition for Robin.

name: Allergy Management Plan
content: Create a management plan to avoid exposure to tuna and handle any accidental ingestions.

name: Language and Communication Development
content: Support language and communication skills through engaging activities.

name: Monthly Well-Child Check-Up
content: Regular monthly well-child check-up to monitor growth and development.

name: Encourage More Vegetable Intake
content: Continue encouraging Robin to eat more vegetables.

name: Monitor and Document Physical Activity
content: Ensure regular weekly physical activity and document his progress.

name: Assess and Support Developmental Milestones
content: Re-assess and support Robin’s developmental milestones especially related to any slight delays.

name: Environmental Allergy Check
content: Check for and remove any potential allergens in Robin's environment besides tuna.

name: Establish Consistent Nanny Communication
content: Establish consistent communication with nanny for updates on Robin’s daily activities and well-being.

name: Gross Motor Skills Enhancement
content: Incorporate activities to enhance Robin’s gross motor skills.

name: Develop a Bedtime Routine
content: Fine-tune Robin's bedtime routine for better sleep quality.

name: Parent-Child Bonding Activities
content: Incorporate daily bonding activities like reading together or playing interactive games.

name: Monthly Well-Child Check-Up
content: Regular monthly well-child check-up to monitor growth and development.

name: Continue Nutrition Plan
content: Continuously encourage a balanced diet and monitor Robin’s intake of vegetables and other essential nutrients.

name: Behavioral Observation and Support
content: Observe and support Robin's behavioral development, ensuring he is emotionally healthy.

name: Fine Motor Skills Activities
content: Introduce activities such as drawing or playing with blocks to enhance fine motor skills.

name: Review and Document Developmental Progress
content: Review Robin’s developmental progress and document any changes or improvements.

name: Encourage Social Skills
content: Engage Robin in social activities to develop social skills.

name: Monitor Sleep Progress
content: Monitor and document Robin’s sleep progress and routine.
